title: How to get free music from Google Play - Quora

response.answer_text: How do you get free music from Google Play? This question was originally worded as Is there a free Google Play Music? “a free Google Play Music”? The Google Play Music app is free. Free music available in the Google Play Music app? There is lots of free music available in Google Play Music. Free music in the Google Play store? There is plenty of free music in the Google Play Store. Are you looking for specific music that is not free, but you want to get it for free? Sorry, Quora isn’t the place to find help with pirating music.

You can upload the music (or in most cases just the fact that you own the music) that you already own, and then play it back from Google Play for free. You can play any of the zillions of “stations” that are in Google Play, for free. You may get the occasional ad in both cases I guess? And you can also sign up for the paid Google Play using one of the deals that get you some amount of time for free (right now I think there’s a July 4th special for like four months free or something?). Hope that’s the sort of thing you meant…
